EmailTemplate.name: RE: IMC and MBO Partners (1342022572.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: IMC and MBO Partners (1342022572.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Mike, Sounds good, looking forward to meeting up with you at the event. If you want to do some more in-depth research I would suggest checking out my private landing page <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> (also there is a picture of me so you will know who to look for at the event.) Have a nice afternoon.Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Valerisys Consulting LLC [mailto:michael.gallo@valerisys.com] Sent: Wednesday, July 11, 2012 6:42 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: IMC and MBO Partners Hi Sara
Thx for reaching out. I am attending Thursday's networking event and I look forward to meeting you. MBO has been on my list of companies to research.
Mike
Sent from my Verizon Wireless 4G LTE smartphone
Sara Conde wrote: Dear Mike, Hello, my name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Raymond Suarez at IMC. He passed along your email reguaring finding at CPA and thought it would be worthwhile for us to discuss MBO Services <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhavUZz57KeI6XhkBXWe5StqbVuEOSo0cAzsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to see if it is something that you might find valuable. If you are intrested in speaking, you may schedule a convenient time by using my online calendar. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhavUZz57KeI6XhkBXWe5StqbVuEOSo0cAzsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Addtionally, I will be going to the IMC networking event <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.imcusa.org/members/group.aspx?id=38605&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhavUZz57KeI6XhkBXWe5StqbVuEOSo0cAzsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> on Thursday as well, not sure if you are planning on attending but perhaps we could speak there as well. I look forward to connecting with you, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1ROvFNi5vmVLa3kmhXNe5vmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhavUZz57KeI6XhkBXWe5StqbVuEOSo0cAzsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlhavUZz57KeI6XhkBXWe5StqbVuEOSo0cAzsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
